Segment.name: G45
Segment.comment: To provide information for a line item

Field.name: UPCCaseCode
Field.comment: Code (Universal Product Code - U.P.C.) including two high order digits identifying the "system" (U.S. Grocery = 00, 06 or 07; U.S. Drug = 03); using the U.S. Grocery system, the next ten digits are: Manufacturer (5) Case Code (5)

Field.name: UPCEanConsumerPackageCode
Field.comment: Code (Universal Product Code - U.P.C.) identifying the retail shelf unit; consists of 2 high order digits identifying the system (U.S. Grocery = 00, 06 or 07, U.S. Drug = 03); the next ten digits are manufacturer ID: 5, Item ID: 5

Field.name: AllowanceOrChargeNumber
Field.comment: The number assigned by a vendor referencing an allowance, promotion, deal or charge

Field.name: ExceptionNumber
Field.comment: A unique number identifying an exception or modification to an offered or existing promotion

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier1
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId1
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: Pack
Field.comment: The number of inner containers, or number of eaches if there are no inner containers, per outer container

Field.name: Size
Field.comment: Size of supplier units in pack

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: InnerPack
Field.comment: The number of eaches per inner container

Field.name: AllowanceOrChargeRate
Field.comment: Allowance or Charge Rate per Unit

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier2
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId2
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier3
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId3
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

SyntaxNote.name: R010205
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of G4501, G4502 or G4505 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0506
SyntaxNote.comment: If either G4505 or G4506 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0809
SyntaxNote.comment: If either G4508 or G4509 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1011
SyntaxNote.comment: If either G4510 or G4511 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1415
SyntaxNote.comment: If either G4514 or G4515 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1617
SyntaxNote.comment: If either G4516 or G4517 is present, then the other is required.
